TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {11630=Based on a Chi-squared analysis, it was believed that the students had not taken the surveys seriously during the 2007-2008 academic year. For this reason, one of a cadre of faculty members went to the beginning of each laboratory section before both the pre-test and the post-test to discuss why the students were taking the surveys. Results of this effort are inconclusive.}
